archetypes.name: The Traditional Executor
archetypes.description: Stable and performing organization in its core business, focused on profitability and operational quality. Innovation is perceived as a risk or cost, not as a strategic lever.
characteristics: Weak culture / Dominant exploitation / Closed innovation
Incremental / Continuous / Market pull / Product / Low
recommendations: Initiate a progressive innovation program (small internal projects)

archetypes.name: The 360Â° Integrator
archetypes.description: Exemplary organization having integrated innovation at all levels: culture, strategy, processes, business models.
characteristics: Strong culture / Ambidexterity / Open / Mixed type
Mixed dynamic / Product-usage-process-business model / Very high
recommendations: Measure and update maturity annually to maintain dynamics
